Name: Electric Avenue
Ingredients: 35 ml Light gold rum (1-3 year old molasses column)
15 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Collins glass .
Prepare garnish of mint sprigs bouquet.
POUR first 4 ingredients into chilled glass.
Two-thirds FILL glass with crushed ice.
Fill glass with more crushed ice and briefly CHURN.
Review: Very fruity with pineapple and citrusy rum sipped through port wine. A refreshing, easy-drinking crowd-pleaser.
History: Created for Bacardí Legacy 2017 by Conor Myers at The Exchequer in Dublin, Ireland.
Nutrition: One serving of Electric Avenue contains 170 calories
